properties.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampshire; Western Hampden
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 10:19AM EST until February 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of a coating to 1 inch of snow with perhaps up to 2 inches in
far northwest Massachusetts. Ice accumulations of a light
glaze following the snow.

* WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Western Hampshire MA and Western
Hampden MA Counties. Mainly for elevations at or above 1000
feet.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions this afternoon. The
main concern is for elevations near or above 1000 feet.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow develops through midday, then changes
to a brief period of sleet and freezing rain during the
afternoon before changing to all rain by late afternoon
afternoon.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
